step_1.heading: MESSAGE US
step_1.para: Message us on Whatsapp or Telegram and tell us what you would like to trade. We will give you a quotation. First time needs to fill in an account opening form.

step_2.heading: TRANSFER
step_2.para: Transfer the payment to the account we provided within 10 mins.

step_3.heading: COMPLETE
step_3.para: When we have confirmed your transaction, we will transfer the cryptocurrecy to the address you provided.
